description: The Aruba Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) client is a secure VPN service for users who need corporate connectivity at home, temporary sites, or while they’re mobile.
displayName: Aruba Networks Virtual Intranet Access Client
summary: The VPN services in ArubaOS include the Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) client, a hybrid IPsec/SSL VPN.
author: Aruba Networks
